page.title: 08DAILY LIFE
page.content: Kevin says on Sundays my mum gets up at 8am and hoovers. She then gets our breakfast,usally scrambled egg. Mum cooks the dinner while I go to play with my friend till 12.30pm. My dad comes home with my Nan,we have roast pork or chicken then custard and apple pie.After dinner out to play while Mum,Dad and Nan stay in and talk and watch T.V. At 4.30pm home for tea mostly sandwiches and cake. After tea we watch T.V. till 8.30pm a cup of tea, wash and go to bed. Monday with Fergus. I get up at 7.30, breakfast of cornflakes.8.25am feed my rabbit 8.30am take Mutley, the dog for a walk 8.45 arrive at school- home again at 3.30 have a snack change my trousers and go out to play. 6.00pm. dinner, watch T.v and then to bed.
